entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is a person who roars 'Prior Incantato!' and shouts 'Deletrius!' to make the smoky skull vanish.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione gasps, horrified, as a gigantic serpent-tongued skull erupts from the point where the two wands met.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is an elf who is shaking convulsively and claims she doesn't know how to do the spell.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley suggests that Winky might have learned the spell from someone else, as few wizards know how to do it.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory accuses Winky of using a wand and doing the spell, saying she's been caught red-handed.
Mr. Weasley speculates that Winky might have learned the spell from someone else, as few wizards know how to do it.
